title: Construction of a nontoxic nano-pesticide toward natural predator for perfect cooperative pest management: An innovative strategy for pesticide reduction
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00060A, Paper
Shang-yuan Wu, Qinhong Jiang, Chun-yang Huang, Hai-lin Yang, Chang-hua Zhang, Meizhen Yin, Jie Shen, Shuo Yan, Hu Li
Historically, the widespread and unscientific application of chemical pesticides has posed serious threats to ecosystem and human health. Hence, there is an urgent demand for efficient alternative technologies for green...
